short_summary: Bid for the acquisition of a Rotating telescopic handler including delivery and training
description: Bid for the acquisition of a Rotating telescopic handler including delivery and training, as outlined in Annex A.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Introduction

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Parks Canada Agency, invites bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of a rotating telescopic handler. The procurement is governed by the [Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)] and subject to the [World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)]. The proposed project involves the delivery and training of the rotating telescopic handler in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada.

### Tender Details

#### Solicitation Information

- **Solicitation Number**: WS3846939588
- **Title**: RFP - Telescopic Rotating Forklift for Parks Canada
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 28, 2023, 14:00 hours EDT
- **Effective Date of Tender**: The Solicitation information will be considered effective as of the publication date, February 28, 2023

#### Procurement Method

The procurement method for this tender is economical procurement, where bidders will compete on the basis of lowest price. Goods and Services Canada will open all bids on the closing date of the tender.

#### Bid Evaluation Criteria

The Bid Evaluation Board will review bid submissions against the tender's evaluation criteria, which are outlined in Annex A. The criteria are as follows: Lowest Price, which will be evaluated on the basis of total price for the goods to be delivered.

#### Notice of Award

Notice of award shall be issued to the successful bidder in due course.

### Additional Information

The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, as well as the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) and the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement. The Solicitation is being held under the auspices of the Sole Procurement Network.
